commands.name: az boards area project create
commands.syntax:
az boards area project create --name
                              [--detect {false, true}]
                              [--org]
                              [--path]
                              [--project]

commands.name: az boards area project delete
commands.syntax:
az boards area project delete --path
                              [--detect {false, true}]
                              [--org]
                              [--project]
                              [--yes]

commands.name: az boards area project list
commands.syntax:
az boards area project list [--depth]
                            [--detect {false, true}]
                            [--org]
                            [--path]
                            [--project]

commands.name: az boards area project show
commands.summary: Show area details for a project.
commands.syntax:
az boards area project show --id
                            [--detect {false, true}]
                            [--org]
                            [--project]

commands.name: az boards area project update
commands.syntax:
az boards area project update --path
                              [--child-id]
                              [--detect {false, true}]
                              [--name]
                              [--org]
                              [--project]
